name: GranGran
0:
”Alexa, open Gran Gran”
”Alexa, start Gran Gran”
”Alexa, launch Gran Gran”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gran gran
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Getting older is hard. Caring for loved ones getting older can be just as hard. Let’s make life a little easier for everyone. 

Using GranGran, Carers can use our web platform to set up helpful reminders. Delivered on an Alexa device, these reminders can help loved ones remember to call relatives, take a stretch with chair exercises, or even make some tea. Keep up the well being of your “care resident” on the GranGran dashboard.

Get started, now. 

1. Enable the skill on the Alexa Skill Store. 
2. Enable the right permissions.
3. Set up your account on app.GranGran.com

----

Note: You will need to provide permission for us to use your email address and create reminders. We use your email address to ensure account security. We won’t SPAM you, we promise! After all, we’re carers, too!
